data.name: Common_xsd
data.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsd:schema id="Common" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xml:lang="en">
<xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation> Common fuzzy matching elements. </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation>
<xsd:element name="Properties" type="Properties"/> <xsd:element name="Property" type="Property"/>
<xsd:attributeGroup name="commonAttribs"> <xsd:attribute name="name" type="xsd:string" use="required" /> <xsd:attribute name="description" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> </xsd:attributeGroup>
<xsd:attributeGroup name="commonAttribsNameOptional"> <xsd:attribute name="name" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="description" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> </xsd:attributeGroup>
<xsd:attributeGroup name="classNameAttribs"> <xsd:attribute name="typeName" type="xsd:string" use="required" /> <xsd:attribute name="assemblyName" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> </xsd:attributeGroup>
<xsd:complexType name="ComparisonType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Properties" type="Properties" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="ComparisonType" use="required" > <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Jaccard" /> <xsd:enumeration value="Left Jaccard Containment" /> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="Properties"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Property" type="Property" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="Property" mixed="true"> <xsd:attribute name="name" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="dataType" type="PropertyDataType" use="optional" /> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:simpleType name="PropertyDataType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="System.Boolean" /> <xsd:enumeration value="System.Byte" /> <xsd:enumeration value="System.SByte" /> <xsd:enumeration value="System.Decimal" /> <xsd:enumeration value="System.Double" /> <xsd:enumeration value="System.Single" /> <xsd:enumeration value="System.Int32" /> <xsd:enumeration value="System.UInt32" /> <xsd:enumeration value="System.Int64" /> <xsd:enumeration value="System.UInt64" /> <xsd:enumeration value="System.UInt16" /> <xsd:enumeration value="System.String" /> <xsd:enumeration value="System.DateTime" /> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType>
<xsd:simpleType name="JoinSideDataType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Left" /> <xsd:enumeration value="Right" /> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType>
</xsd:schema>

data.name: ComparisonDefinition_xsd
data.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsd:schema id="ComparisonDefinition" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xml:lang="en"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation> This schema defines a fuzzy query. </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation>
<xsd:include schemaLocation="Common.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="DomainManager.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="IndexDefinition.xsd"/>
<xsd:element name="Comparison" type="Comparison"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation> Defines a fuzzy comparison. </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element>
<xsd:complexType name="Comparison"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Domains" type="DomainNames" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ExactMatchDomains" type="DomainNames" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Comparer" type="Comparer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="name" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="description" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="leftRowsetName" type="xsd:string" use="required" /> <xsd:attribute name="rightRowsetName" type="xsd:string" use="required" /> </xsd:complexType>
</xsd:schema>

data.name: Configuration_xsd
data.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsd:schema id="Configuration" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xml:lang="en">
<xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation> Fuzzy Lookup Configuration </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation>
<xsd:include schemaLocation="Common.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="DomainManager.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="IndexDefinition.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="QueryDefinition.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="RowsetManager.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="ComparisonDefinition.xsd"/>
<xsd:element name="Configuration" type="Configuration"></xsd:element>
<xsd:complexType name="Configuration"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RowsetManager" type="RowsetManager" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="DomainManager" type="DomainManager" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="FuzzyLookup" type="FuzzyLookup" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="FuzzyIndex" type="FuzzyIndex" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="RecordBinding" type="RecordBinding" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="2"/> <xsd:element name="SignatureGenerator" type="SignatureGenerator" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Comparison" type="Comparison" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
</xsd:schema>

data.name: DomainManager_xsd
data.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsd:schema id="DomainManager" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xml:lang="en"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation> This schema defines a Domain Manager. </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation>
<xsd:include schemaLocation="Common.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="RowsetManager.xsd"/>
<xsd:element name="DomainManager" type="DomainManager"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Domain" type="Domain"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TokenIdProvider" type="TokenIdProviderType"/> <xsd:element name="Tokenizer" type="TokenizerType"/> <xsd:element name="TokenWeightProvider" type="TokenWeightProvider"/> <xsd:element name="TransformationProvider" type="TransformationProvider"/> <xsd:element name="TransformationFilter" type="TransformationFilter"/>
<xsd:complexType name="DomainManager"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RowsetManager" type="RowsetManager" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> <xsd:element name="TokenIdProvider" type="TokenIdProviderType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> <xsd:element name="Properties" type="Properties" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Domains" type="DomainsType" minOccurs="1" /> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribsNameOptional" /> <xsd:attribute name="creationConnectionName" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:attributeGroup name="rowsetAttribs"> <!--<xsd:attribute name="rowsetName" type="xsd:string" use="optional" />--> </xsd:attributeGroup>
<xsd:complexType name="DomainNames"> <xsd:sequence> <!--Having two elements with the name Domain is very problematic...--> <xsd:element name="Domain" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="TokenIdProviderType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Properties" type="Properties" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="classNameAttribs" /> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribsNameOptional" /> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="TokenizerType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Properties" type="Properties" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="classNameAttribs" /> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribsNameOptional" /> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="DomainsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Domain" type="Domain" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="TokenWeightProvider"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Properties" type="Properties" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="classNameAttribs" /> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribsNameOptional" /> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="rowsetAttribs" /> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="Domain"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Tokenizer" type="TokenizerType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> <xsd:element name="TokenWeightProvider" type="TokenWeightProvider" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> <xsd:element name="LeftTransformationProviders" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" > <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TransformationProvider" type="TransformationProvider" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RightTransformationProviders" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" > <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TransformationProvider" type="TransformationProvider" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PairSpecificTransformationProviders" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" > <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TransformationProvider" type="TransformationProvider" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribs" /> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="TransformationProvider"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Properties" type="Properties" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> <xsd:element name="TransformationFilters" type="TransformationFilters" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="classNameAttribs" /> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribsNameOptional" /> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="rowsetAttribs" /> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="TransformationFilters"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TransformationFilter" type="TransformationFilter" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="TransformationFilter"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Properties" type="Properties" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="classNameAttribs" /> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribsNameOptional" /> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="rowsetAttribs" /> </xsd:complexType>
</xsd:schema>

data.name: IndexDefinition_xsd
data.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsd:schema id="FuzzyIndex" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xml:lang="en">
<xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation> This schema defines a fuzzy match index. </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation>
<xsd:include schemaLocation="Common.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="DomainManager.xsd"/>
<xsd:element name="FuzzyIndex" type="FuzzyIndex"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation> Defines a fuzzy match index. </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element>
<xsd:element name="FuzzyLookup" type="FuzzyLookup"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation> Defines a fuzzy lookup. </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element>
<xsd:element name="Lookups" type="Lookups"/> <xsd:element name="Lookup" type="Lookup"/> <xsd:element name="Comparer" type="Comparer"/> <xsd:element name="Objects" type="Objects"/> <xsd:element name="Object" type="Object"/> <xsd:element name="TunerSettings" type="TunerSettings"/> <xsd:element name="SignatureGenerator" type="SignatureGenerator"/> <xsd:element name="StateManager" type="StateManager"/>
<xsd:complexType name="FuzzyLookup"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="StateManager" type="StateManager" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> <xsd:element name="Properties" type="Properties" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> <xsd:element name="Lookups" type="Lookups" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> <xsd:element name="KeyColumns" type="KeyColumns" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> <xsd:element name="RecordBinding" type="RecordBinding" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribsNameOptional" /> <xsd:attribute name="domainManagerName" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="referenceRowsetName" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="KeyColumns"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Column" type="ColumnType" minOccurs="0" /> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="FuzzyIndex"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RecordBinding" type="RecordBinding" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> <xsd:element name="Properties" type="Properties" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> <xsd:element name="Lookups" type="Lookups" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribsNameOptional" /> <xsd:attribute name="domainManagerName" type="xsd:string" use="required" /> <xsd:attribute name="rowsetName" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="creationConnectionName" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="joinSide" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="ridType" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="recordTableName" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="recordContextTableName" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="signatureTableName" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="Comparer"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Properties" type="Properties" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> <xsd:element name="RecordBinding" type="RecordBinding" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="2" /> <xsd:element name="Domains" type="DomainNames" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ExactMatchDomains" type="DomainNames" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="classNameAttribs"/> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribsNameOptional"/> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="StateManager"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Properties" type="Properties" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="classNameAttribs"/> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribsNameOptional"/> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="Objects"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Object" type="Object" minOccurs="0" /> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="Object"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Properties" type="Properties" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="classNameAttribs"/> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribs"/> <xsd:attribute name="acquireReferences" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional" /> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="Lookups"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Lookup" type="Lookup" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="Lookup"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Domains" type="DomainNames" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ExactMatchDomains" type="DomainNames" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="SignatureGenerator" type="SignatureGenerator" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Comparer" type="Comparer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribsNameOptional" /> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="SignatureGenerator"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Properties" type="Properties" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> <!-- MinQueryThreshold, LSH Settings--> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="classNameAttribs"/> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribsNameOptional"/> <xsd:attribute name="joinSide" type="JoinSideDataType" use="optional" /> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="TunerSettings"> <xsd:attribute name="enabled" type="xsd:boolean" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="minQueryThreshold" type="xsd:double" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="comparisonType" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> </xsd:complexType>
</xsd:schema>

data.name: QueryDefinition_xsd
data.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsd:schema id="FuzzyQueryDefinition" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xml:lang="en">
<xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation> This schema defines a fuzzy query. </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation>
<xsd:include schemaLocation="Common.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="IndexDefinition.xsd"/>
<xsd:element name="FuzzyQuery"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation> Defines a fuzzy match query. </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation>
<xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Properties" type="Properties" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" />
<xsd:element name="Lookup" type="Lookup" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" />
<xsd:element name="Comparer" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Properties" type="Properties" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" /> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="classNameAttribs"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element>
</xsd:sequence>
<xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribs" /> <xsd:attribute name="indexName" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="lookupName" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="rowsetName" type="xsd:string" use="optional" />
</xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

data.name: Results_xsd
data.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsd:schema id="Result" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xml:lang="en">
<xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation> This schema defines fuzzy comparison and match results. </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation>
<xsd:include schemaLocation="Common.xsd"/>
<xsd:element name="ComparisonResults"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation> Defines a list of fuzzy comparison results. </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ComparisonResult" type="ComparisonResult" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element>
<xsd:complexType name="ComparisonResult"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Score" type="xsd:double" />
<!-- LeftRecord, RightRecord, LeftRecordContext, RightRecordContext, LeftTransformationsApplied, RightTransformationsApplied -->
</xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

data.name: RowsetManager_xsd
data.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xsd:schema id="Data" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xml:lang="en">
<xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation> Defines a rowset manager. </xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation>
<xsd:include schemaLocation="Common.xsd"/>
<xsd:element name="RowsetManager" type="RowsetManager" /> <xsd:element name="Connections" type="Connections" /> <xsd:element name="Rowsets" type="Rowsets" /> <xsd:element name="SqlRowset" type="SqlRowset" /> <xsd:element name="InlineRowset" type="InlineRowset" /> <xsd:element name="CsvFileRowset" type="CsvFileRowset" /> <xsd:element name="RecordBindings" type="RecordBindings"/> <xsd:element name="RecordBinding" type="RecordBinding"/> <xsd:element name="Column" type="ColumnType"/>
<xsd:complexType name="RowsetManager"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Connections" type="Connections" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="Rowsets" type="Rowsets" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="RecordBindings" type="RecordBindings" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="Connections"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Connection" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribs" /> <xsd:attribute name="connectionString" type="xsd:string" use="required" /> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="Rowsets" > <xsd:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <!--<xsd:element ref="SqlRowset" /> <xsd:element ref="InlineRowset" />--> <xsd:any namespace="##any" processContents="skip" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:choice> <xsd:attribute name="default" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="SqlRowset"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribsNameOptional" /> <xsd:attribute name="ridColumnName" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="connectionName" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="CsvFileRowset"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribsNameOptional" /> <xsd:attribute name="ridColumnName" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="fileName" type="xsd:string" use="required" /> <xsd:attribute name="columnNames" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="delimiter" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="InlineRowset"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:any namespace="##any" processContents="skip" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribsNameOptional" /> <xsd:attribute name="ridColumnName" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="ridColumnType" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="Schema"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Column"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribs" /> <xsd:attribute name="dataType" type="xsd:string" use="required" /> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="ColumnType"> <xsd:attribute name="description" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="name" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="ordinal" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="type" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <!-- CLR type e.g., "System.String" --> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="RecordBinding"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="DomainBinding" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Column" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="domainName" type="xsd:string" use="required" /> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attributeGroup ref="commonAttribsNameOptional" /> <xsd:attribute name="rowsetName" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="ridOrdinal" type="xsd:int" use="optional" /> <xsd:attribute name="joinSide" type="xsd:string" use="optional" /> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="RecordBindings"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RecordBinding" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
</xsd:schema>
